How we work

1. Discovery & Audit: Comprehensive analysis of your current AI visibility, competitor landscape, and optimization opportunities.

2. Technical Implementation: Create llms.txt files, structured data, and AI-friendly content formats optimized for location- and industry-specific queries.

3. Content optimization: Create and refine content that AI chatbots can easily understand, reference, and recommend to users.

4. Testing & Monitoring: Regular testing across AI platforms and continuous monitoring of your recommendation frequency and quality.

5. optimization & Reporting: Ongoing refinements based on performance data and detailed monthly reports showing your AI visibility progress.
